titles.title: A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Eleventh Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 9/9/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Makes majority party appointments to the following Senate Committees for the 111th Congress: (1) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; and (2) Health, Education, Labor, and Pension.
